N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 460.3 - Selection of homemakers

State Regulations

Homemakers shall be selected in accordance with civil
service requirements. In accordance with rules of the board (18 NYCRR
98.1
), they shall have the qualifications established by the appropriate civil service
commission. In selecting persons for employment from among those who have such
qualifications, public welfare departments shall select those who are: (a) mature, stable women with experience in
homemaking; (b) in good health as
established by an initial physical examination and an annual one thereafter, including chest X-ray and blood tests; (c) of proven ability to read and write with
completion of elementary school or better, as desirable; and
(d) evaluated through interview as to her
interest and respect for people, ability to adapt readily to varying
situations, responsibility and ability to exercise independent judgment and
make sound decisions. Notes
